thread.section_title: XKGLOW Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of XKGLOW | xkglow.com
thread.title: Evan

author: Evan
title: Evan
text:
XKGlow has came out with an pretty good product for those wanting demon eyes without having to have them custom fabricated into their headlight housings. Quality is good.
There are some quirks about the design of the controller like not being able to run it into the car and not providing enough wiring for it. Other than that it's easy to install and connect to the application for Android and iOS.
